content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. Moving in a clockwise direction from the sunglasses, the elements on the path are a wolf spider, a mashed potato, a jeep, a Bluetick Coonhound, a white-headed capuchin, a filing cabinet, a sea cucumber, a screwdriver, a ski, an Egyptian Mau, an Alaskan Malamute, a fire salamander, a teddy bear, an oxygen mask, a split-rail fence, a pan flute, a shower curtain, a sea lion, and a fountain. What will you find?

Problem 1:
